title: Request an Office Move
description: A faculty member is changing offices and needs to request assistance from facilities to move their belongings.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member, their current office, and their new office location.
Create a work order for the facilities team to perform the physical move.
Create a related ticket for IT to move and set up the faculty member's computer and phone in the new office.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the IT portion of the move.
